title: Native Instruments Maschine Expansion Grey Forge v1.0.0-R2R [dee
description:
Native Instruments Maschine Expansion Grey Forge v1.0.0





GREY FORGE takes you to the dark heart of techno. New MASCHINE 2 Drum Synth kits load with auto-mapped macro controls Ã¢â‚¬â€œ perfect for evolving sets that run till the break of dawn. Step into the shadows with custom effect chains and fresh MASSIVE presets for hardline basses and leads.

EVOLVING DRUMS

GREY FORGE features 14 custom MASCHINE 2 Drum Synth kits. Each is tweaked to sonic perfection, but is also totally flexible Ã¢â‚¬â€œ go from light adjustments to completely twisting them apart. 230 additional drum synth presets let you hand-pick your kits for your own signature sound.

MASTER OF CONTROL

Turn a single sound into a performance. When using the drum synth kits, macro controls carefully selected for dramatic sound shifts put maximum creativity at the turn of a knob. Load a sound, grab the knobs, and go.

TEXTURED GRIT

Once youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve laid down the pulse, add an array of grainy bleeps and one shots sampled from analog drum machines and custom modular synth improv sessions Ã¢â‚¬â€œ all expertly tuned for maximum impact. Then use 40 monolithic new MASSIVE presets to slice through the club with steely precision.

EFFECTRICITY

Reshape your sets with fresh custom effect chains Ã¢â‚¬â€œ a playground for dark sound design. Each brings together the best of MASCHINEÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s internal effects in all-new chains perfect for adding ambience, grit or all-out mayhem to your sounds.
